items.sentence: God forbid that anything should happen to Tom.
The party organized by Tom was a huge success.
Tom took little sips of the piping hot coffee.
Tom laughed so much tears ran down his cheeks.
What would I have to do to get you to help me?
Tom called Mary to tell her that he was sorry.
Tom thought he was destined for bigger things.
Tom is back in Boston, working for his father.
Tom and John were fighting in the parking lot.
Any time you need something, just let me know.
